code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> BOOT
    BOOT --> INIT_HW: EV_HW_OK
    INIT_HW --> IDLE: EV_HW_OK
    INIT_HW --> FAULT: EV_HW_FAIL
    
    IDLE --> ARMED: EV_CMD_ARM
    IDLE --> RAMP_UP: EV_CMD_START
    
    ARMED --> RAMP_UP: EV_CMD_START
    ARMED --> IDLE: EV_CMD_STOP
    
    RAMP_UP --> ACTIVE: targets_reached
    RAMP_UP --> RAMP_DOWN: EV_CMD_STOP
    
    ACTIVE --> RAMP_CHANGE: EV_CMD_SET_PARAMS
    ACTIVE --> RAMP_DOWN: EV_CMD_STOP
    
    RAMP_CHANGE --> ACTIVE: targets_reached
    RAMP_CHANGE --> RAMP_DOWN: EV_CMD_STOP
    
    RAMP_DOWN --> IDLE: all_zero
    
    IDLE --> FAULT: EV_FAULT_*
    ARMED --> FAULT: EV_FAULT_*
    RAMP_UP --> FAULT: EV_FAULT_*
    ACTIVE --> FAULT: EV_FAULT_*
    RAMP_DOWN --> FAULT: EV_FAULT_*
    
    FAULT --> IDLE: EV_CMD_ACK (if safe)
    
    IDLE --> SHUTDOWN: EV_CMD_SHUTDOWN
    SHUTDOWN --> [*]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Generic Diagram应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Generic Diagram完成整个流程。
